about.title: About Me
about.intro1: I'm Francisco, a software architect with over 4 years of experience specialized in the JavaScript ecosystem. My passion is transforming complex ideas into elegant and functional web solutions.
about.intro2: I started my career in web development exploring different technologies until I found my specialization in React, Next.js, and Node.js. Throughout these years, I've had the opportunity to work on challenging projects that have allowed me to grow both technically and professionally.
about.intro3: I currently work at Probien Bienes Exclusivos, where I develop custom CRM systems and e-commerce platforms for the real estate sector. My work includes everything from designing scalable architectures to implementing complex search functionalities with Meilisearch and Elasticsearch.
about.intro4: What I enjoy most about development is the problem-solving process: understanding requirements, designing the most efficient solution, and writing clean code that other developers can easily maintain. I firmly believe that code should be both functional and readable.
about.frontendDesc: I create modern and responsive user interfaces with React, Next.js, and Astro, prioritizing user experience and performance.
about.backendDesc: I design and implement scalable REST APIs with Node.js and Express, integrating databases like PostgreSQL and Supabase.
about.searchDesc: I implement advanced search solutions with Meilisearch and Elasticsearch to enhance user experience.
about.architectureDesc: I design scalable and maintainable architectures, making technical decisions that ensure long-term project success.
about.cleanCodeDesc: I write code thinking about the next developer who will read it, even if that developer is myself in 6 months.
about.learningDesc: Technology evolves rapidly. I stay updated with the latest trends and best practices in web development.
about.userFirstDesc: Every technical decision is made with the goal of creating the best possible experience for the end user.
about.performanceDesc: I optimize every application to be fast and efficient, because users value their time.
about.letsTalkDesc: I'm always open to new interesting projects and collaboration opportunities. If you have an idea or project in mind, I'd love to hear from you.
